title: List Basics Practice
instructions: Practice creating lists, accessing elements with indexing, checking membership, and modifying list elements.
hints: Middle element is at index len(items) // 2
Use tuple unpacking to swap: a, b = b, a
Use in operator to check membership
Check if index is within valid range: -len <= index < len
description: Practice creating lists, accessing elements with indexing, checking membership, and modifying list elements.
